entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 08:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: S 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
